# Work from essential
df =pd.read_csv('../input/amazonin-scraped-data/wfh essentials.csv')
df
source.a456d5b3:
# How ever for convenience we will replace NaN with -999

df.fillna(-999)
source.336219cf:
# df['result'] = df['Price'].str.replace(r'\D', '') #remove String from obj type only numerical will be left as it is

df['Price_Rs'] = df['Price'].str.replace(r'\D', '').astype(int) # here we are removing string and converting to int
df
source.7ea7591f:
df.Rating.str.split(r'\D').str.get(0) # returns 1st value of rating
df.Rating.str.split(r'\D').str.get(1) # returns 2nd value
# Now combing both we will get
df.Rating.str.split(r'\D').str.get(0) + '.' + df.Rating.str.split(r'\D').str.get(1)
source.7f1b53dd:
# df['Reviews Count'] = df['Reviews Count'].astype(int)

df['Reviews Count'] = df['Reviews Count'].str.replace(r'\D', '').astype(float) # here we are removing string and converting to int
df
